sub_title: Senior Business Consultant at CGI Nederland
summary:
Experienced Technology Professional | Product Management | Portfolio Management | Solution Strategy

I am a technology professional with over 10 years of experience in product management, portfolio management and solution strategy. I thrive on finding innovative and efficient solutions to complex challenges. Throughout my career, I have held key roles as a Senior Consultant, Solutions Strategist, and Product Owner/Product Manager, working with leading organisations such as FNB South Africa and CGI Nederland.

As a Senior Consultant at CGI Nederland, I work as a Product Owner/Manager. In this role, I maintain relationships with stakeholders, define and refine backlogs and work with development teams. I ensure transparent and visible backlogs, manage epics and features, and execute product roadmaps by implementing SAFe 5.0 best practices. Additionally, I lead Agile ceremonies alongside Scrum Masters and provide strategic analysis for large and strategic projects. I also play a crucial role in driving business transformation within the business unit and provide mentorship to other professionals.

Previously, as a Product Owner/Manager at FNB, I led cross-functional teams and successfully delivered high-quality products amongst my other duties. I played a pivotal role in creating and implementing strategies for new business units and new businesses. My efforts resulted in the successful implementation of first-to-country solutions and scalability projects.

My educational background includes an MBA from Wits University and the University of Cologne, where I focused on leadership, innovation, and technology. I also hold a Bachelor of Business Science (Honours in Information Systems) from the University of KwaZulu Natal, Westville.

Throughout my career, I have honed my skills in leadership, communication, product and portfolio management, business analysis, innovation, strategy, technology, and organisational development. I am experienced in Agile methodologies, SAFe 5.0 PMPO, Azure DevOps, Scrum, and Waterfall. I am also fluent in English, Afrikaans, and have a working proficiency in German and a basic understanding and ability to speak Dutch.

Outside of work, I embrace an active and social lifestyle. I enjoy exploring the Netherlands and Europe, trying new foods, and engaging in physical activities such as cycling and gym workouts. 

If you are interested in connecting or discussing potential opportunities, please feel free to reach out to me.

#TechnologyProfessional #ProductManagement #StrategicPlanning #BusinessAnalysis #AgileMethodology

treasury_media.title: Master of Business Administration
treasury_media.description: Graduated from WBS with International Business Electives from University of Cologne

profile_positions.description:
-	Maintain relationship with stakeholders
-	Define, refine and prioritise backlog for transparency
-	Implement SAFe 5.0 best practices
-	Lead Agile ceremonies alongside Scrum Masters
-	Involvement in main deliverables with stakeholder involvement (steering and setting direction)
-	Conduct analysis for large and strategic projects
-	Lead cross-functional teams during large strategic projects
-	Drive business transformation elements within the BU and advise regarding transformation epics
-	Support, collaborate and mentor
-	Facilitate PI Planning for the teams alongside the Scrum Masters
-	Provide long term technological solutions and advice despite the smaller solutions requested
-	Work alongside stakeholders to optimise process for solution implementation
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Consultant | Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Strategy and Development of new businesses
•	Development of main pillars and functions for new business
•	Development of systems for new businesses as well as new products or services for the business
•	Development of organogram for new business
•	Budgets and other costs related to new business and the operations
•	Created backlogs and managed them
•	Managed Roadmap and reported to COO and CEO of new business unit and business
•	Liaison among stakeholders and management of stakeholders
•	Responsible for ideation, conceptualisation of new systems and  products
•	Provide solutions for business and system problems before, during and after launch of products, services and systems
•	Product manager for all products, services and systems that are in development phase.
•	Manage scrum team
•	Responsible for testing products, services and systems before, during and after live date.
•	Strategise future growth of new business.
•	Responsible for successful launch of new business and it’s products, services and systems
•	Currently working on building the Ikusasa Financial Aid Progamme (ISFAP) Foundation systems, products and services which grants bursaries to students in the poor and missing middle income brackets (R0 – R600 000) and provides them with support to successfully achieve their qualifications as well as become employed once graduated
•	Main projects in this Role:
o	Lead BA and Project Lead for development of Origination system (application and verification system for ISFAP)
o	Lead BA and Project Lead for development of Wrap Around System for ISFAP (student lifecycle system – first of its kind in SA)
o	Responsible for strategic and innovative direction for ventures into the early childhood development (ECD) sector
o	Responsible for team of graduate developed projects for ECD and implementation of projects nationally while working with other South African and international ECD partners
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Liaison among stakeholders
• Responsible for managing stakeholders
• Analysis of requirements received from Business
• IT consultant to business to provide possible solutions to future projects.
• Assess and analyse the business problem or need and determine sustainable solutions.
• Host design sessions with technical team to build dynamic solutions.
• Host JAD sessions to fine tune design and development of the project to prototype a solution that meets the requirements.
• Deliver high quality Functional Requirements Specification (FRS).
• Host project progress meetings to determine status of the project, testing management, defect management, risk management and timeline management of the project during the lifecycle of the project.
• Assist developer/programmer/test analyst with technical development of the project as well as testing during the life cycle of the project.
• Responsible for Implementation/Rollout plan.
• Follow up with business after implementation to ensure that project was implemented successfully and that the business is satisfied with the product/service provided.
• Post-Implementation defect management.
• Manage General Ledger on a daily basis – aside from project work.
• Worked on projects that involved FNB’s various subsidiaries such as Namibia, Botswana, South Africa, Swaziland, Lesotho, Zambia, Tanzania, India, Ghana, Guernsey and Nigeria.
• Manage live and test defects for S&I.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Role performed in conjunction with Business Analyst role above
• Promote Innovative thinking within CTS .
• Market and manage the FNB Innovations Programme..
• Facilitate and guide Innovators in the use of the Innovations website.
• Facilitate, guide and judge presentations of Innovations.
• Judge Innovations at a Business Unit Level (within CTS).
• Advise and guide Innovators on presentation format and good presentation habits.
• Ensure each Innovation has sufficient business benefit to FNB.
• Responsible for any questions surrounding the process of the competition, process of judging sessions and presentation format to be used.
• Manage other champions within CTS that assist with guiding Innovators with their projects.
• Reward winning Innovations at a Business Unit level.
• Communicate Innovative projects to CEO and other EXCO members at EXCO meetings via presentations.
• Discuss future Innovations with CEO and Application Development Managers of CTS.
profile_positions.title: Innovation Champion
